name: Renegade (itch)
description:
Platforming cyberpunk game made by Team ZYNCKO for #cyberpunkjam of march 2014!

WSAD to move. Space to jump, and hold space to jump higher. 

Hold Q and hover your mouse to equip or use items you find. Mouse to aim and shoot after you find and equip a gun.

Comments are highly appreciated! Enjoy! :)

If the game doesn't run, please contact me on twitter @mistalemur

To play:

Download and run renegade.exe

It takes a while to start up.

If it doesn't launch, try running as admin...

If it still doesn't launch, try looking for and deleting the /Documents/BYOND folder

If it STILL doesn't launch... You can try installing BYOND v504 from here, then downloading RenegadeBYOND.zip, and then running Renegade.dmb after unpacking...
